42 #ifndef TEUCHOS_AS_HPP

53 namespace Teuchos {
54 
55 
125 template<class TypeTo, class TypeFrom>
126 class ValueTypeConversionTraits {
127 public:
129  static TypeTo convert (const TypeFrom t) {
130  // This default implementation is just an implicit conversion and
131  // may generate compiler warnings on dangerous conversions.
132  return t;
133  }
134 
136  static TypeTo safeConvert (const TypeFrom t) {
137  // This default implementation is just an implicit conversion and
138  // may generate compiler warnings on dangerous conversions. No
139  // runtime checking (e.g., for overflow) can be done by default;
140  // only specializations can define meaningful and portable
141  // run-time checks of conversions.
142  return t;
143  }
144 };
145 
212 template<class TypeTo, class TypeFrom>
213 inline TypeTo as( const TypeFrom& t )
214 {
215 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_DEBUG
216  return ValueTypeConversionTraits<TypeTo,TypeFrom>::safeConvert(t);
217 #else
218  return ValueTypeConversionTraits<TypeTo,TypeFrom>::convert(t);
219 #endif // HAVE_TEUCHOS_DEBUG
220 }
221 
222 
270 template<class TypeTo, class TypeFrom>
271 inline TypeTo asSafe( const TypeFrom& t )
272 {
273  return ValueTypeConversionTraits<TypeTo,TypeFrom>::safeConvert(t);
274 }
275 
276 
288 template <class TypeTo>
289 class asFunc {
290  public:
291  asFunc() {}
292 
293  template <class TypeFrom>
294  inline TypeTo operator()(const TypeFrom &t) {
295  return as<TypeTo>(t);
296  }
297 };
298 
299 
300 //
301 // Standard specializations of ValueTypeConversionTraits
302 //
303 
305 template<>
306 class ValueTypeConversionTraits<int, double> {
307 public:
313  static int convert (const double t) {
314  // Implicit conversion from double to int causes compiler
315  // warnings, but static_cast does not.
316  return static_cast<int> (t);
317  }
318 
320  static int safeConvert (const double t) {
321  const int minInt = std::numeric_limits<int>::min ();
322  const int maxInt = std::numeric_limits<int>::max ();
323 
324  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(
325  t < static_cast<double> (minInt) || t > static_cast<double> (maxInt),
326  std::range_error,
327  "Teuchos::ValueTypeConversionTraits<int, double>::safeConvert: "
328  "Input double t = " << t << " is out of the valid range [" << minInt
329  << ", " << maxInt << "] for conversion to int.");
330  return static_cast<int> (t);
331  }
332 };
333 
335 template<>
336 class ValueTypeConversionTraits<int, float> {
337 public:
339  static int convert (const float t) {
340  // Implicit conversion from float to int may cause compiler
341  // warnings, but static_cast does not. Note that casting from
342  // (32-bit) float to (32-bit signed) int can never overflow.
343  return static_cast<int> (t);
344  }
345 
347  static int safeConvert (const float t) {
348  // Implicit conversion from float to int may cause compiler
349  // warnings, but static_cast does not. Note that casting from
350  // (32-bit) float to (32-bit signed) int can never overflow.
351  return static_cast<int> (t);
352  }
353 };

359 template<>
360 class ValueTypeConversionTraits<float, long long> {
361 public:
367  static float convert (const long long t) {
368  // Implicit conversion from long long to float may cause compiler
369  // warnings, but static_cast does not.
370  return static_cast<float> (t);
371  }
372 
374  static float safeConvert (const long long t) {
375  const float minFloat = std::numeric_limits<float>::min ();
376  const float maxFloat = std::numeric_limits<float>::max ();
377 
378  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(
379  t < static_cast<long long> (minFloat) ||
380  t > static_cast<long long> (maxFloat),
381  std::range_error,
382  "Teuchos::ValueTypeConversionTraits<float, long long>::safeConvert: "
383  "Input long long t = " << t << " is out of the valid range [" << minFloat
384  << ", " << maxFloat << "] for conversion to float.");
385 
386  // Implicit conversion from long long to float may cause compiler
387  // warnings, but static_cast does not.
388  return static_cast<float> (t);
389  }
390 };

393 template<>
394 class ValueTypeConversionTraits<float, unsigned long long> {
395 public:
401  static float convert (const unsigned long long t) {
402  // Implicit conversion from unsigned long long to float may cause
403  // compiler warnings, but static_cast does not.
404  return static_cast<float> (t);
405  }
406 
408  static float safeConvert (const unsigned long long t) {
409  const float minFloat = std::numeric_limits<float>::min ();
410  const float maxFloat = std::numeric_limits<float>::max ();
411 
412  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(
413  t < static_cast<unsigned long long> (minFloat) ||
414  t > static_cast<unsigned long long> (maxFloat),
415  std::invalid_argument,
416  "Teuchos::ValueTypeConversionTraits<float, unsigned long long>::safeConvert: "
417  "Input unsigned long long t = " << t << " is out of the valid range [" << minFloat
418  << ", " << maxFloat << "] for conversion to float.");
419 
420  // Implicit conversion from unsigned long long to float may cause
421  // compiler warnings, but static_cast does not.
422  return static_cast<float> (t);
423  }
424 };

462 template<>
463 class ValueTypeConversionTraits<unsigned int, long long> {
464 public:
470  static unsigned int convert (const long long t) {
471  // Implicit conversion from long long to unsigned int may cause
472  // compiler warnings, but static_cast does not.
473  return static_cast<unsigned int> (t);
474  }
475 
477  static unsigned int safeConvert (const long long t) {
478  const unsigned int minInt = std::numeric_limits<unsigned int>::min ();
479  const unsigned int maxInt = std::numeric_limits<unsigned int>::max ();
480 
481  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(
482  t < static_cast<long long> (minInt) ||
483  t > static_cast<long long> (maxInt),
484  std::range_error,
485  "Teuchos::ValueTypeConversionTraits<unsigned int, long long>::safeConvert: "
486  "Input long long t = " << t << " is out of the valid range [" << minInt
487  << ", " << maxInt << "] for conversion to unsigned int.");
488 
489  // Implicit conversion from long long to unsigned int may cause
490  // compiler warnings, but static_cast does not.
491  return static_cast<unsigned int> (t);
492  }

531 class ValueTypeConversionTraits<unsigned int, unsigned long long> {
532 public:
538  static unsigned int convert (const unsigned long long t) {
539  // Implicit conversion from unsigned long long to unsigned int may
540  // cause compiler warnings, but static_cast does not.
541  return static_cast<unsigned int> (t);
542  }
543 
545  static unsigned int safeConvert (const unsigned long long t) {
546  const unsigned int minInt = std::numeric_limits<unsigned int>::min ();
547  const unsigned int maxInt = std::numeric_limits<unsigned int>::max ();
548 
549  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(
550  t < static_cast<unsigned long long> (minInt) ||
551  t > static_cast<unsigned long long> (maxInt),
552  std::invalid_argument,
553  "Teuchos::ValueTypeConversionTraits<unsigned int, unsigned long long>::safeConvert: "
554  "Input unsigned long long t = " << t << " is out of the valid range [" << minInt
555  << ", " << maxInt << "] for conversion to unsigned int.");
556 
557  // Implicit conversion from unsigned long long to unsigned int may
558  // cause compiler warnings, but static_cast does not.
559  return static_cast<unsigned int> (t);
560  }
561 };

565 
567 template<int N>
568 class ValueTypeConversionTraits<std::string, char[N]> {
569 public:
570  static std::string convert( const char t[] )
571  { return std::string(t); }
572  static std::string safeConvert( const char t[] )
573  { return std::string(t); }
574 };

579 template <>
580 class ValueTypeConversionTraits<double, qd_real> {
581 public:
582  inline static double convert( const qd_real t )
583  { return to_double(t); }
584  inline static double safeConvert( const qd_real t )
585  { return to_double(t); }
586 };
587

590 class ValueTypeConversionTraits<float, qd_real> {
591 public:
592  inline static float convert( const qd_real t )
593  { return (float)to_double(t); }
594  inline static float safeConvert( const qd_real t )
595  { return (float)to_double(t); }
596 };

649 template <>
650 class ValueTypeConversionTraits<qd_real, long unsigned int> {
651 public:
652  inline static qd_real convert( const long unsigned int t )
653  { return ValueTypeConversionTraits<qd_real,int>::convert(ValueTypeConversionTraits<int,long unsigned int>::convert(t)); }
654  inline static qd_real safeConvert( const long unsigned int t )
655  { return ValueTypeConversionTraits<qd_real,int>::safeConvert(ValueTypeConversionTraits<int,long unsigned int>::safeConvert(t)); }
656 };
657 
659 template <>
660 class ValueTypeConversionTraits<dd_real, long unsigned int> {
661 public:
662  inline static dd_real convert( const long unsigned int t )
663  { return ValueTypeConversionTraits<dd_real,int>::convert(ValueTypeConversionTraits<int,long unsigned int>::convert(t)); }
664  inline static dd_real safeConvert( const long unsigned int t )
665  { return ValueTypeConversionTraits<dd_real,int>::safeConvert(ValueTypeConversionTraits<int,long unsigned int>::safeConvert(t)); }
666 };

Teuchos::ValueTypeConversionTraits::safeConvert
static TypeTo safeConvert(const TypeFrom t)
Convert t from a TypeFrom object to a TypeTo object, in a more safe way.
Definition: Teuchos_as.hpp:136

#define TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(throw_exception_test, Exception, msg)
Macro for throwing an exception with breakpointing to ease debugging.

Teuchos::ValueTypeConversionTraits
Default traits class for all conversions between value types.

Teuchos
The Teuchos namespace contains all of the classes, structs and enums used by Teuchos, as well as a number of utility routines.
